message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, I'm a bit concerned that $120 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $160. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I'm glad we're getting closer to a deal, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'm counteroffering at $155. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit below my target. I'd be willing to pay $130 for the product. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
